"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"tokenReserveFactor","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newImplementation","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"upgradeToAndCall","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Supala Labs","details":"This contract implements a dynamic interest rate model based on utilization rates.      The model uses two slopes: one from 0% to optimal utilization, and another from optimal to max utilization.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract)."}],"ERC1967InvalidImplementation(address)":[{"details":"The `implementation` of the proxy is invalid."}],"ERC1967NonPayable()":[{"details":"An upgrade function sees `msg.value > 0` that may be lost."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"FailedCall()":[{"details":"A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted."}],"InvalidInitialization()":[{"details":"The contract is already initialized."}],"MaxUtilizationReached(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"_maxUtilization":"The maximum utilization rate","_token":"The token address that has exceeded the maximum utilization rate","_utilization":"The utilization rate that exceeded the maximum utilization rate"}}],"NotInitializing()":[{"details":"The contract is not initializing."}],"UUPSUnauthorizedCallContext()":[{"details":"The call is from an unauthorized context."}],"UUPSUnsupportedProxiableUUID(bytes32)":[{"details":"The storage `slot` is unsupported as a UUID."}]},"events":{"Initialized(uint64)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"LendingPoolBaseRateSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","rate":"The new base rate"}},"LendingPoolMaxRateSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","maxRate":"The new max rate"}},"LendingPoolMaxUtilizationSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","utilization":"The new max utilization"}},"LendingPoolOptimalUtilizationSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","utilization":"The new optimal utilization"}},"LendingPoolRateAtOptimalSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","rate":"The new rate at optimal"}},"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"ScaledPercentageSet(uint256)":{"params":{"percentage":"The new scaled percentage"}},"TokenReserveFactorSet(address,uint256)":{"params":{"lendingPool":"The lending pool address","reserveFactor":"The new reserve factor"}},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"calculateBorrowRate(address)":{"details":"Uses a two-slope interest rate model:      - Base rate to optimal utilization: linear increase from base rate to rate at optimal      - Above optimal utilization: sharp increase from rate at optimal to 100%      - Returns base rate when no supply exists or no borrows exist","params":{"_lendingPool":"The token address to calculate borrow rate for"},"returns":{"borrowRate":"The annual borrow rate scaled by 100 (e.g., 500 = 5%)"}},"calculateInterest(address,uint256)":{"details":"Interest = (totalBorrowAssets * borrowRate * elapsedTime) / (10000 * 365 days)","params":{"_elapsedTime":"Time elapsed since last accrual in seconds","_lendingPool":"The lending pool address"},"returns":{"interest":"The interest amount accrued","reserveYield":"The yield for reserve","supplyYield":"The yield for suppliers"}},"constructor":{"details":"This prevents the implementation contract from being initialized directly"},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize()":{"details":"This function replaces the constructor for upgradeable contracts.      Sets up default scaled percentage to 1e18 (100% in basis points)"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setLendingPoolBaseRate(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Base rate is the minimum interest rate (scaled by 100)","params":{"_lendingPool":"The lending pool address","_rate":"The new base rate (e.g., 500 = 5%)"}},"setLendingPoolMaxRate(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Maximum rate is the highest interest rate (scaled by 1e18)","params":{"_lendingPool":"The lending pool address","_maxRate":"The new maximum rate (e.g., 20e16 = 20%)"}},"setLendingPoolMaxUtilization(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Borrowing is blocked when utilization reaches this threshold (scaled by 1e18)","params":{"_lendingPool":"The lending pool address","_utilization":"The new max utilization (e.g., 95e16 = 95%)"}},"setLendingPoolOptimalUtilization(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Optimal utilization is where the rate curve changes slope (scaled by 1e18)","params":{"_lendingPool":"The lending pool address","_utilization":"The new optimal utilization (e.g., 75e16 = 75%)"}},"setLendingPoolRateAtOptimal(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. This is the rate at the optimal utilization point (scaled by 1e18)","params":{"_lendingPool":"The lending pool address","_rate":"The new rate at optimal (e.g., 10e16 = 10%)"}},"setScaledPercentage(uint256)":{"details":"Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Typically set to 1e18 (100% in basis points)","params":{"_percentage":"The new scaled percentage"}},"setTokenReserveFactor(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Reserve factor is the percentage of borrow assets that are set aside as reserves (scaled by 1e18)","params":{"_lendingPool":"The lending pool address","_reserveFactor":"The new reserve factor (e.g., 10e16 = 10%)"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas."},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow-reachable":"delegatecall","details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."}},"stateVariables":{"lendingPoolBaseRate":{"details":"Lending Pool Router address => base rate"},"lendingPoolMaxRate":{"details":"Lending Pool Router address => max rate"},"lendingPoolMaxUtilization":{"details":"Lending Pool Router address => max utilization"},"lendingPoolOptimalUtilization":{"details":"Lending Pool Router address => optimal utilization"},"lendingPoolRateAtOptimal":{"details":"Lending Pool Router address => rate at optimal"},"tokenReserveFactor":{"details":"Lending Pool Router address => reserve factor"}},"title":"InterestRateModel","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"MaxUtilizationReached(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the utilization rate exceeds the maximum utilization rate"}]},"events":{"LendingPoolBaseRateSet(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lending pool's base rate is updated"},"LendingPoolMaxRateSet(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lending pool's max rate is updated"},"LendingPoolMaxUtilizationSet(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lending pool's max utilization is updated"},"LendingPoolOptimalUtilizationSet(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lending pool's optimal utilization is updated"},"LendingPoolRateAtOptimalSet(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lending pool's rate at optimal is updated"},"ScaledPercentageSet(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the scaled percentage is updated"},"TokenReserveFactorSet(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a token's reserve factor is updated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"OWNER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for accounts that have owner privileges"},"UPGRADER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for accounts that can upgrade the contract"},"calculateBorrowRate(address)":{"notice":"Calculates the current borrow rate based on utilization"},"calculateInterest(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates interest accrued over a time period"},"constructor":{"notice":"Contract constructor that disables initializers for the implementation contract"},"initialize()":{"notice":"Initializes the upgradeable contract with default settings and roles"},"lendingPoolBaseRate(address)":{"notice":"Base interest rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 5e16 = 5%)"},"lendingPoolMaxRate(address)":{"notice":"Maximum allowed interest rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 1e18 = 100%)"},"lendingPoolMaxUtilization(address)":{"notice":"Maximum allowed utilization rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 95e16 = 95%)"},"lendingPoolOptimalUtilization(address)":{"notice":"Optimal utilization rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 75e16 = 75%)"},"lendingPoolRateAtOptimal(address)":{"notice":"Interest rate at optimal utilization for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 10e16 = 10%)"},"scaledPercentage()":{"notice":"Scaled percentage base for calculations (basis points, e.g., 1e18 = 100%)"},"setLendingPoolBaseRate(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the base rate for a token"},"setLendingPoolMaxRate(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the maximum rate for a token"},"setLendingPoolMaxUtilization(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the maximum utilization rate for a token"},"setLendingPoolOptimalUtilization(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the optimal utilization rate for a token"},"setLendingPoolRateAtOptimal(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the interest rate at optimal utilization for a token"},"setScaledPercentage(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the scaled percentage base for calculations"},"setTokenReserveFactor(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the reserve factor for a token"},"tokenReserveFactor(address)":{"notice":"Reserve factor for each ppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/InterestRateModel.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6e06c10da14aa9e45666857380e87d61269a48680eab5ec59a3897c62faa8cd1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://07f0f544865783cef81a292cad64af7458ffcae8e2228171ece2e7add6e72525","dweb:/ipfs/Qma9CcZWMy22EvgMgRXFSRLAhtr59YAienPKR6J7CD4mSy"]},"src/interfaces/ILPRouter.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa503f1d4765bacff796c38eb14419e7294c5f652bd544460eaf000447618d87d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f1743341db69e2cea6ad8a9d917416dc0ebbfbd543362baaa0232640f33fe3da","dweb:/ipfs/QmbVYW6VQwFZAjZVoYRt6n1MPSgbK1v6RevmXhbYQeNRTi"]}},"version":1}

calculateBorrowRate(address).details: Uses a two-slope interest rate model:      - Base rate to optimal utilization: linear increase from base rate to rate at optimal      - Above optimal utilization: sharp increase from rate at optimal to 100%      - Returns base rate when no supply exists or no borrows exist

params._lendingPool: The token address to calculate borrow rate for

returns.borrowRate: The annual borrow rate scaled by 100 (e.g., 500 = 5%)

params._elapsedTime: Time elapsed since last accrual in seconds

constructor.details: This prevents the implementation contract from being initialized directly

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

initialize().details: This function replaces the constructor for upgradeable contracts.      Sets up default scaled percentage to 1e18 (100% in basis points)

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setLendingPoolBaseRate(address,uint256).details: Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Base rate is the minimum interest rate (scaled by 100)

setLendingPoolMaxRate(address,uint256).details: Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Maximum rate is the highest interest rate (scaled by 1e18)

setLendingPoolMaxUtilization(address,uin.details: Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Borrowing is blocked when utilization reaches this threshold (scaled by 1e18)

setLendingPoolOptimalUtilization(address.details: Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Optimal utilization is where the rate curve changes slope (scaled by 1e18)

setLendingPoolRateAtOptimal(address,uint.details: Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. This is the rate at the optimal utilization point (scaled by 1e18)

setScaledPercentage(uint256).details: Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Typically set to 1e18 (100% in basis points)

setTokenReserveFactor(address,uint256).details: Only OWNER_ROLE can call this. Reserve factor is the percentage of borrow assets that are set aside as reserves (scaled by 1e18)

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

OWNER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for accounts that have owner privileges

UPGRADER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for accounts that can upgrade the contract

calculateBorrowRate(address).notice: Calculates the current borrow rate based on utilization

calculateInterest(address,uint256).notice: Calculates interest accrued over a time period

constructor.notice: Contract constructor that disables initializers for the implementation contract

initialize().notice: Initializes the upgradeable contract with default settings and roles

lendingPoolBaseRate(address).notice: Base interest rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 5e16 = 5%)

lendingPoolMaxRate(address).notice: Maximum allowed interest rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 1e18 = 100%)

lendingPoolMaxUtilization(address).notice: Maximum allowed utilization rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 95e16 = 95%)

lendingPoolOptimalUtilization(address).notice: Optimal utilization rate for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 75e16 = 75%)

lendingPoolRateAtOptimal(address).notice: Interest rate at optimal utilization for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 10e16 = 10%)

scaledPercentage().notice: Scaled percentage base for calculations (basis points, e.g., 1e18 = 100%)

setLendingPoolBaseRate(address,uint256).notice: Sets the base rate for a token

setLendingPoolMaxRate(address,uint256).notice: Sets the maximum rate for a token

setLendingPoolMaxUtilization(address,uin.notice: Sets the maximum utilization rate for a token

setLendingPoolOptimalUtilization(address.notice: Sets the optimal utilization rate for a token

setLendingPoolRateAtOptimal(address,uint.notice: Sets the interest rate at optimal utilization for a token

setScaledPercentage(uint256).notice: Sets the scaled percentage base for calculations

setTokenReserveFactor(address,uint256).notice: Sets the reserve factor for a token

tokenReserveFactor(address).notice: Reserve factor for each token (scaled by 1e18, e.g., 1e18 = 100%)
